title: Bilgewater Skins Availability
body: Does anyone know if the Bilgewater skins, such as Cutpurse Twisted Fate, are only available during the event? Or will they always be for sale?

replies.body: They're regular skins that will be freely available to purchase at any time, including after the event.

Thank you, i found the discussion about all the event items right after you answered me! In case you need it, here it is. Thanks again! <3 http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/tXjcpYAU-act-1-questions-about-the-bilgewater-event-we-got-you-covered
Yay FAQs! :D Glad you got your answer!

Lol, i literally posted the same thing right after you xD
Well, I had already posted it but it was deleted because wrong board. Anywho, I'd like an answer aswell >:)
